REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to requiring the payment of small business grants within one hundred twenty days of notification of such funding
Summary: Relates to requiring the payment of small business grants within one hundred twenty days of notification of such funding.
LawCode: Amd ยง1854, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to requiring the payment of small business grants within one hundred twenty days of notification of such funding
